formattedAddress: 2301 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd #135, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2301 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd #135, New York, NY 10030-2640, USA

originalText.text: I don't usually write a review. I felt the need to express my gratitude to the women Arnez (not sure of the spelling), however, we were in need of a casket spray this morning because we had forgot to order it yesterday. My husband called her at 8:10am to ask if she could make this last minute request happen, she did! The service viewing started at 9am, and the casket spray was delivered at 9:15am like she said. She created a beautiful spray and we are forever grateful to Floral Expression of Harlem!!!

originalText.text: A staple in the HARLEM community. They are very pleasant and reliable. They never disappoint. Stop by and show some love. Thanks for all the wonder arrangements.

text.text: A staple in the HARLEM community. They are very pleasant and reliable. They never disappoint. Stop by and show some love. Thanks for all the wonder arrangements.

originalText.text: Very unprofessional. I called to order a Wreath for a funeral. The gentleman placed me on hold for about a minute. Then came back to say I’m sorry we’re very busy and hung up the phone. I called back and I said did you hang up by mistake and was told no and to call back some other time. I understand your busy but how about ask me to come into the store, shop the website or simply place me on an extended hold. They just lost a customer.

text.text: Very unprofessional. I called to order a Wreath for a funeral. The gentleman placed me on hold for about a minute. Then came back to say I’m sorry we’re very busy and hung up the phone. I called back and I said did you hang up by mistake and was told no and to call back some other time. I understand your busy but how about ask me to come into the store, shop the website or simply place me on an extended hold. They just lost a customer.

originalText.text: Called at 10 am to order a bouquet for a wedding proposal needed by 3pm. The man says yes we can do this, then later calls back arguing with me about the last minute request. Horrible attitude. Clearly they don’t value mutual respect at this establishment. If you can’t do it, say so.

text.text: Called at 10 am to order a bouquet for a wedding proposal needed by 3pm. The man says yes we can do this, then later calls back arguing with me about the last minute request. Horrible attitude. Clearly they don’t value mutual respect at this establishment. If you can’t do it, say so.

originalText.text:
We ordered over $500 in flowers for my brother and sister-in laws wedding.

We showed them a picture of the bridal bouquet as well as bridesmaids bouquet and did not get what we asked for the bouquets were all skimpy and not worth the money we spent. When I went back to the florist to attempt to get it rectified, they were not very willing, explaining that the picture I showed is what I got.

I was very disappointed & had a extremely disappointed bride. Never again will I purchase from them for such an event:
